Jean-Michel Cousteau Resort - Fiji This boutique eco-friendly resort features elegant Bures alongside Savusavu Bay. It's unique in providing a romantic luxury experience for couples whilst being family friendly. Surrounded by a marine sanctuary, pristine coral reefs and beaches guests of all ages enjoy an interactive experience. Garden View Bure (5 Nights) Travel Dates: 1 Nov - 19 Dec 26 & 1 Jan - 31 Mar 27 Twin per person fr $5,085 Extra Nights fr $1,017 per person Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $2,540 Extra Nights fr $508 per person Travel Dates: 20 Jun - 31 Oct 26 Twin per person fr $6,675 Extra Nights fr $1,335 per person Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $3,335 Extra Nights fr $667 per person Travel Dates: 1 Apr - 19 Jun 26 Twin per person fr $6,545 Extra Nights fr $1,309 per person Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $3,270 Extra Nights fr $654 per person Travel Dates: 1 Nov - 31 Oct 26 Twin per person fr $9,085 Extra Nights fr $1,817 per person Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $4,545 Extra Nights fr $909 per person Travel Dates: 1 Apr - 19 Jun 26 Twin per person fr $8,915 Extra Nights fr $1,783 per person Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $4,455 Extra Nights fr $891 per person Travel Dates: 1 Nov - 19 Dec 26 & 1 Jan - 31 Mar 27 Twin per person fr $8,695 Extra Nights fr $1,739 per person Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $4,350 Extra Nights fr $870 per person Includes 5 nights at Jean-Michel Cousteau Resort- Fiji - Full breakfast, lunch and dinner daily per person. - Return transfers & meet and greet at Nadi and Savusavu Domestic Airport - Non-alcoholic beverages including specialty loose-leaf teas, espresso coffees, afternoon tea (excluding mocktails, fresh lemonade, milkshake, smoothies). - Activities including five off site excursions scheduled on a weekly basis and daily family and adult boat snorkel trips with resident marine biologist. - Snorkel equipment. - Yoga. - Wifi. - Daily wash and fold laundry service. - Evening entertainment. - Daily Bula Club for children 6-12 years (between 08:30am - 09:00pm). - Fijian buddy for children aged 6 to 15 years (maximum 1-6 ratio). - Daily nanny for each child under 6 years at time of travel (08:30am-06:30pm). - One dedicated nanny per bure from 06:30pm-09:00pm. - Teenagers club with dedicated activities staff member from 08:30am-06:00pm. Bonus Stay 2 additional nights for FREE for travel 01 Apr-19 Jun, 01 Aug-31 Oct, 01 Nov-19 Dec 26 & 16 Jan-31 Mar 27 Per Person, from $2,540 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 25 Mar 2027. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 1 Apr 2026 to 31 Mar 2027 (unless otherwise specified).A surcharge may apply for stays over event dates, please enquire for more info. Please note there is limited availability on the advertised room types and all pricing is subject to change until a reservation is confirmed. Inventory & availability can change on a daily basis. All components are strictly subject to availability. Land only - Please add on your best available airfare. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For split stays please contact your travel consultant. Extra night pricing where packages include car hire is for accommodation only, please enquire for additional car hire day costs. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. ISSUE DATE: 17 Oct 25.
